scenario_text.value:
Takuma, there! That’s it! That’s the weird
thing!
Huh?! UWAAAH! A hew-mun?

A creature? Here? Chase it away before it can
hurt anyone!

(But it doesn’t seem very threatening.
Maybe it can talk?)

(If we know what it wants we might be able to
work together.)
(What should I do?)
Try talking to it.
Chase it away.
Give it some nuts.
Try talking to it.

Hello? Are you all alone?
Why are you out here?
I’ve got nothing to say to you...
Takuma, look! There’s something on its mouth!
Is that...a piece of a nut?
Ahhh... AAAAAAH!
It ran off...

I wonder if it stole some of the nuts we were
saving...
It must have been hungry.
Chase it away.

(It doesn’t seem threatening, but that could
all be an act.)

It’s gotta be dangerous.
Agumon, let’s chase it away!
Right!
Ahhh... AAAAAAH!
It ran off before we could fight...
Hang on. It might not have been an enemy...
Give it some nuts.
If you won’t fight us, we won’t fight you.

Really? If that’s the case, I need to ask you
something.
I’m so hungry...

I found some nuts in that building but I’m
still so hungry...

You want something to eat?
Do you want these nuts?
Really? Yes, please!
It ate them all!
*munch* *munch* *munch*
*om* *nom* *nom* Yum, yum!
So good! But I’m still hungry...
Hmm... I can’t carry any more right now.
But hang on. You could join us!

We can’t just give you our food, but if you
joined the group, that’d be different.

We need a lot of allies today.
If we feed you, will you help us?
I will! For food, I’ll happily help!
I’m Betamon. Nice to meet you!
